text: The slaty bristlefront (Merulaxis ater) is a member of the tapaculos, the Neotropical bird family Rhinocryptidae. It inhabits the forests of south-east Brazil. It is currently becoming rare due to habitat loss, especially to the lowland forests. ==References== * ==External links== *Image at ADW * slaty bristlefront Category:Birds of the Atlantic Forest Category:Endemic birds of Brazil slaty bristlefront slaty bristlefront
title: Slaty bristlefront
